name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【福岡サンパレス】 [ysmbvtf3_bc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performing "Newton". This section includes vocal parts and a dance performance.
Instrumental transition between songs with audience cheering.

subtitles.original: ...のようだ
subtitles.english: ...Like a

subtitles.original: 嵐 地鳴り乗りこなしていくんだ
subtitles.english: I'll ride through the storms and the tremors

subtitles.original: 透明で
subtitles.english: Transparent

subtitles.original: 鮮明で
subtitles.english: Vivid

subtitles.original: 叫び声あげる前
subtitles.english: Before letting out a scream

subtitles.original: 泥塗れ
subtitles.english: Covered in mud

subtitles.original: 失敗し転がっていくの
subtitles.english: Failing and tumbling down

subtitles.original: このままずっと降りやまない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: In this world of never-ending rain

subtitles.original: 愛するしかない それしかない 昨日じゃないから
subtitles.english: There's nothing but to love, only that, for it's not yesterday

subtitles.original: 白紙になった青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: What page was it of my youth that turned blank?

subtitles.original: 忘れ物 思い出せないまま
subtitles.english: Still unable to remember what I've forgotten

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ このままじゃ
subtitles.english: I won't forget, not like this

subtitles.original: ねえ このままずっと降りやまない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, in this world of never-ending rain

subtitles.original: もう許すしかない 人になれる生き物だから
subtitles.english: There's nothing left but to forgive, since we're creatures that can become human

subtitles.original: 白紙になった青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: What page was it of my youth that turned blank?

subtitles.original: いま君に会いたいと 涙こらえて
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, wanting to see you now

subtitles.original: さよならだ さよならだって 認めたくないけど
subtitles.english: It's goodbye, it's goodbye, although I don't want to admit it

subtitles.original: 雨上がりのこの世界が 眩しいから
subtitles.english: Because this world after the rain is so dazzling

subtitles.original: もう帰らない 振り返らない 思い出とともに
subtitles.english: I won't go back, I won't look back, together with the memories

subtitles.original: 新しい風になれ そしてまた君に
subtitles.english: Become a new wind, and once again, to you...

subtitles.original: 会いたいと願い 駆けていく
subtitles.english: Wishing to see you, I'll run...

subtitles.original: 駆けていく
subtitles.english: I'll run...

subtitles.original: 空っぽな財布 凍えた叙情
subtitles.english: An empty wallet, frozen lyricism

subtitles.original: ガラクタ透けた 逃げ場所なんて見た
subtitles.english: Junk showed through, I saw a place like an escape

subtitles.original:
どんな言葉にも ちゃんと語尾があったのに
もう今は土に遊ぼう
subtitles.english:
Every word used to have a proper ending
But now let's play in the dirt

subtitles.original: どうでもいい朝になれすぎて
subtitles.english: Getting too used to mornings that don't matter

subtitles.original: 傘を持ってない 借りてた未来
subtitles.english: I don't have an umbrella, for the future I borrowed

subtitles.original: 乾ききった喉 乾ききった殻 街行くよそもの
subtitles.english: A parched throat, a parched shell, a stranger walking through the town

subtitles.original: ねえ独りだ 飾ってたのは Maybe rainy, rainy
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm alone, what I was decorating was "Maybe rainy, rainy"

subtitles.original: 君を待っていたの rainy
subtitles.english: I was waiting for you, rainy

subtitles.original: 悲しくはないよ 嬉しくもないよ Maybe rainy, rainy
subtitles.english: It's not sad, it's not happy either, Maybe rainy, rainy

subtitles.original: 汚れきった日々に
subtitles.english: In the days that have become completely filthy

subtitles.original: 原色式の細路地染める rainy, rainy
subtitles.english: Dyeing the narrow alleys in primary colors, rainy, rainy

subtitles.original: こんな間違いだらけ rainy
subtitles.english: So full of mistakes, rainy

subtitles.original: 塗りつぶしていく パノラマ rainy, rainy
subtitles.english: Painting over the panorama, rainy, rainy

subtitles.original: 君を待っていたの Bye-bye
subtitles.english: I was waiting for you, Bye-bye

subtitles.original: Bye-bye 汚れきった日々の賞賛
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, praise for the days that have become completely filthy

subtitles.original: 真昼の感情は 案内役は置いて
subtitles.english: Midday emotions, leaving the guide behind

subtitles.original: 光当たった それでよかった
subtitles.english: The light hit, and that was good enough

subtitles.original: 泣いて 泣いて 泣いて 涙が枯れ果てた
subtitles.english: Crying, crying, crying until my tears ran dry

subtitles.original: 使い捨ての命は回したくないな
subtitles.english: I don't want to spin this disposable life

subtitles.original: 喧騒興奮の ざわめき声 夢中同盟
subtitles.english: The rustling voices of bustle and excitement, an alliance in a trance

subtitles.original: 白い煙に巻かれながら歌う 救いのない世迷い事
subtitles.english: Singing while enveloped in white smoke, words of no salvation

subtitles.original: ねえ独りだ 綻ばせたのは Maybe rainy, rainy
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm alone, what I caused to fray was "Maybe rainy, rainy"

subtitles.original: 君を待っていたの Maybe...
subtitles.english: I was waiting for you, Maybe...
